MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH42 postcode area of Dunbar, affecting properties in Little Spott Cottages and surrounding areas . It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11am due to faulty overhead equipment near Spott Mill and this may affect the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to the complexity of the repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm via generator. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.11pm on Saturday, 06 February 2021.
